local_intent: Perceive the red can if needed, then approach and align to it within 0.01 tolerance and verify arrival.
assumptions: The can may already be visible; scanning is only used if visibility check fails.
coherence_with_global: Replicates the global perception fallback (visibility -> scan+detect), performs ApproachAndAlign with the same parameters, then verifies position using IsAt, aligning with the approach phase of the global plan.
